column2: Excellent communication skills in Japanese, English, Chinese and Dutch.
Ability to make complicated things easy and write attractive articles.
Ability to write interesting stories, based on the interview and research.
In-depth financial knowledge and many writing and editing experiences.

A world citizen with broad vision, who has been living, working, and studying in many countries like Japan, China, the U.S., Singapore, and others.","{'country': 'Netherlands', 'short': 'Eindhoven,
